name: Blocks Next: Puzzle logic game
description:
From this moment, let us enjoy the simple and addictive puzzle game!
Once you start, you will be able to break away.

The logic is fairly simple game for any age group.
Just to clear the board of all blocks.


HOW TO PLAY
• click on the block with an arrow outside the playing field.
• If three or more blocks of the same color form a group, they will disappear.
• when the playing field is cleared of blocks, the level will be passed.

Good luck :)
